Key:
Maybe I'll check out the rooftop. I hope Kurumi's
there.
Translation:
Quizá vaya a la azotea. Espero
que Kurumi esté allí.

Key:
I'll try going to the rooftop. Kurumi's like a
phantom, so she might be there. At least,
I hope.
Translation:
Intentaré ir a la azotea. Kurumi es como un fantasma,
así que puede que esté allí.
Al menos, eso espero.

Key: What am I talking about...?

(I sound like a girl with a crush... Kind of
embarrassing.)
Itsuka-kun!
...Huh?
I finally got you...

H-Huh? What are you doing here Tama-cha—
I mean, Okamine-sensei?
Translation:
¿H-Huh? ¿Qué estás haciendo aquí Tama-cha-
quiero decir, Okamine-sensei?

Key:
I know you've been on leave so it can't be
helped, but your social studies paper is due
today.
Translation:
Sé que has estado ausente, así que no se
puede evitar, pero tu trabajo de estudios
sociales vence hoy.

Key: Oh...
You're the only one who hasn't turned it in yet.
Translation: Eres el único que aún no lo ha entregado.

Key:
Um, could you give me an extension? I'll get
right to it.
Translation:
¿Podría darme una extensión?
Me pondré a ello.

Key: Nope. You can't slide out of this one!

You'd better turn it in today. I'll wait for you
in the teacher's lounge... Promise me!
Translation:
Será mejor que lo entregues hoy. Te esperaré en
la sala de profesores... ¡Prométemelo!

Key: *sigh*...
(I can't help it, I guess... I'll do my report.)
Translation: (No puedo evitarlo, supongo... Haré mi informe).

Key:
...Good job. Next time, be sure to not forget,
okay?
Translation:
...Buen trabajo. La próxima vez, asegúrese
de no olvidarlo, ¿de acuerdo?

Key: Okay. Sorry about that. I'll be on my way then!
Translation: Vale. Lo siento. ¡Seguiré mi camino entonces!

Key: Okay!
*sigh*... Look at the time.

The sun's set. I don't think I can go on a date
today... *sigh*.
Translation:
El sol se ha puesto. No creo que
pueda ir a una cita hoy... *suspiro*.

Key:
If I will suffice, then I can go with you now if
you'd like?
Translation:
Si es suficiente, entonces puedo
ir con usted ahora, si lo desea.

Key: Kurumi?! So you WERE at school today!
Translation: ¡¿Kurumi?! ¡Así que estuviste en la escuela hoy!

Key:
Good day, Shido-san. Last night was certainly
stimulating.
Translation:
Buenos días, Shido-san. Anoche
fue ciertamente estimulante.

Key:
Yeah. Thanks to you, I got a scolding from my
little sister. But you saved me. Thanks.
Translation:
Sí. Gracias a ti, recibí una reprimenda de
mi hermana pequeña. Pero me salvaste. Gracias.

Key: You're welcome.

Anyways, I've told you before, but you shouldn't
be walking around school like this. It'd only
cause more problems.
Translation:
De todos modos, ya te lo he dicho antes,
pero no deberías andar así por la escuela.
Sólo causaría más problemas.

Key: Oh, but I'm careful not let anyone detect me.
Translation: Pero tengo cuidado de que nadie me detecte.

Key:
I wanted to see you earlier, but... I am
refraining as much as I can, you know?
Translation:
Quería verte antes, pero... Me estoy
absteniendo todo lo que puedo, ¿sabes?

Key: O-Oh...
...So then, how about that date?
You won't blush again, will you?
Hehe, I don't know. That's up to you.
Translation: No lo sé. Eso depende de ti.

Key:
Okay, fine. It's kinda hard to find somewhere
to go right now, isn't it?
Translation:
Vale, bien. Es un poco difícil encontrar un
sitio al que ir ahora mismo, ¿verdad?

Key: ...I don't mind it being here.
Huh? Here... as in the classroom?
Yes, isn't it wonderful? To be your classmate.
Translation: Sí, ¿no es maravilloso? Ser tu compañero de clase.

Key:
You were my classmate until recently. Although
it was a little short for my liking.
Translation:
Fuiste mi compañero de clase hasta hace poco.
Aunque fue un poco corto para mi gusto.

Key: Don't mind the details.
Translation: No te preocupes por los detalles.

Key:
I'm regretting it a little. I wish I had done
much more when we were classmates.
Translation:
Me arrepiento un poco. Ojalá hubiera hecho mucho
más cuando éramos compañeros de clase.

Key: Then, do you want to be my classmate?
Translation: Entonces, ¿quieres ser mi compañero de clase?

Key: ...Excuse me?

It's only you and me here. It might just be
role-play, but if you don't mind, we can play
pretend.
Translation:
Aquí sólo estamos tú y yo. Puede que sólo sea
un juego de rol, pero si no te importa,
podemos jugar a fingir.

Key: Well... That sounds very fun. Hehe.
Translation: Bueno... Eso suena muy divertido. Jeje.

Key:
Then, allow me to introduce myself. My name
is Kurumi Tokisaki. Nice to meet you.
Translation:
Entonces, permítanme presentarme. Mi nombre
es Kurumi Tokisaki. Encantada de conocerle.

Key:
Isn't that different from how it happened?
Remember... you used to say, "I am a Spirit"...
Translation:
¿No es eso diferente de cómo sucedió? Recuerda…
solías decir, "Soy un Espíritu"...

Key: But then I wouldn't be a normal classmate.
Translation: Pero entonces no sería un compañero normal.

Key: I-I see... you have a point.
Um, Shido-san?
What is it?
...What do classmates do?
Uh, I don't know.
My, you don't know either, Shido-san?
I never thought about it.
You wanna just do stuff that we'd do at school?
Translation: ¿Quieres hacer cosas que haríamos en la escuela?

Key: Sure. Then, how's this...?
...Shido-san?
Y-Yes, Tokisaki-sensei.
This area requires correction.
Oh! I-I'm sorry...
Hehe... Bad boy.
(S-So close! Her face is too close!)
...Oh, and I spotted one more error.
Translation: ...Ah, y he detectado un error más.

Key: Huh...?
When we are alone... you must call me Kurumi.
Translation: Cuando estemos solos... debes llamarme Kurumi.

Key: K-Kurumi... sensei.
Hehe...
Y-You're a little... too close!
Silly boy, it's intentional.

We're not done yet. Enough calling me "sensei".
Now, go on...
Translation:
Aún no hemos terminado. Basta de llamarme
"sensei". Ahora, vamos...

Key: K-Kurumi...
Well done. Would you like a reward?
H-Hey! Keep your clothes on!
Oh, but I'm just getting started.

Y-You know, Kurumi... Classmates wouldn't
do this!
Translation:
S-Sabes, Kurumi... ¡Los compañeros
de clase no harían esto!

Key: Hehe. Come to think of it, you're right.
Translation: Jeje. Ahora que lo pienso, tienes razón.

Key:
You know, Kurumi. Where'd you learn how to
act out these... scenarios?
Translation:
Sabes, Kurumi. ¿Dónde aprendiste a
representar estos... escenarios?

Key: Where? At the bookstore you visited, Shido-san.
Translation: ¿En dónde? En la librería que visitaste, Shido-san.

Key:
Seriously?! And you should've called...
Wait, no, that's not even it! AAAAH!
Translation:
¡¿En serio?! Y deberías haber llamado... Espera,
no, ¡ni siquiera es eso! ¡AAAAH!

Key: Are you that shocked?
Please forget you saw that.
Translation: Por favor, olvida que viste eso.

Key: Hehe. Very well.
Haha...
What's the matter?
Well, I figured it'd be like this.
Translation: Bueno, me imaginé que sería así.

Key: ...Huh?

Being able to talk about whimsical stuff or
nothing at all... Even being able to have fun.
Translation:
Poder hablar de cosas caprichosas o de nada…
Incluso poder divertirse.

Key: Is that so...?
Yeah, I think... That's how it is for us.
Translation: Sí, creo que... Así es para nosotros.

Key: Oh, I gotta get going soon.
I see. I had hoped to be with you a bit longer.
Translation: Ya veo. Esperaba estar contigo un poco más.

Key: Oh, sorry... If I had made the time...
Translation: Oh, lo siento... Si hubiera hecho tiempo...

Key: I don't mind. Rather...

Thank you for today. I quite enjoyed myself.
Although our time was short, I was able to
be your classmate again.
Translation:
Gracias por lo de hoy. Me lo he pasado muy bien.
Aunque nuestro tiempo ha sido corto, he podido
volver a ser tu compañero de clase.

Key: Y-Yeah...
It's nice to have a friend.
Yup, the feeling is mutual.
Well, good night, Shido-san.
Okay... Later.

Kurumi seemed to be having a good time. It
was as if she was an ordinary girl.
Translation:
Kurumi parecía estar pasándoselo bien. Era
como si fuera una chica normal y corriente.

Key:
(But Kurumi has a secret, and it might be
something we don't see eye to eye on.)
Translation:
(Pero Kurumi tiene un secreto, y puede que
sea algo en lo que no coincidamos).

Key:
(I won't know unless I ask her the truth,
but... I wish Kurumi could tell me first.)
Translation:
(No lo sabré a menos que le pregunte la verdad, pero…
me gustaría que Kurumi me lo dijera primero).

Key:
(I want to continue enjoying myself around
Kurumi. Thinking about it now, maybe this is what
Kotori meant when she said I have no urgency.)
Translation:
(Quiero seguir disfrutando con Kurumi. Pensándolo
ahora, quizá a esto se refería Kotori cuando dijo
que no tengo urgencia).
